A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I won't Rabble about the movie...a lot of other people did this and yeha...Just a quick overview of MY opinion to this...Disasterpiece

+ great visuals
+ star wars sounds and sountrack
+ dark
+ ONE cool new force mechanics
+ Adam Driver

- Story-Potholes all over the Place
- very bad writing
- Bad Main and Sidestories
- Destroyed/dropt the good and promising Introductions of Ep. VII (e.g. Knights of Ren\, Kylo's Helmet / Vader worship\, Reys parents\, Snoke...)
- too much of very bad humor (even insulting)
- no lightsaber duel (wtf?)
- All-powerfull Rey
- unbelievably dump written characters (Rose\, Holdo\, Rey\, Thief...)
- Destruction of Luke Skywalker
- Canto Bight
- Political Messages all over the place (feminism\, animals\, bad white men in power...)  
- Unwise/stupid new possibilities in Force/Universe (e.g. Lightingspeed-suicide\, doppelgangering\, Mary Poppins move...) 
- Rian Johnson and Katheleen Kennedy insulting the fans
- no hopes for episode 9
